greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: T(n,k) = number of permutations on 123...n with exactly one abc pattern and no aj pattern with j<=k, for n>=0, 0<=k<=n.
link: J. Noonan and D. Zeilberger, [math/9808080] The Enumeration of Permutations With a Prescribed Number of ``Forbidden'' Patterns. Also Adv. in Appl. Math. 17 (1996), no. 4, 381--407. MR1422065 (97j:05003).
xref: See A084249 for a curtailed version. See also A229158, A229160.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2013
